mapper.select: SELECT m.*,ma.mid maid,ma.mname mname,ma.parentid parentid,ma.catalog catalog FROM `motorcycle` m INNER JOIN `maintenance` ma ON ma.mid=m.mid WHERE m.cbno=#{id}

SELECT m.*,ma.mid maid,ma.mname mname,ma.parentid parentid,ma.catalog catalog FROM `motorcycle` m INNER JOIN `maintenance` ma ON ma.mid=m.mid WHERE m.cbno=#{cbno} and (m.moid=#{cbnos} or m.moiname LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{cbnos},'%'))
mapper.sql: moid, cbno, moiname, moprice, moyearprice, modischarge, modomestic, mofuel, load, mid, img, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select: SELECT moid, cbno, moiname, moprice, moyearprice, modischarge, modomestic, mofuel, `load`, `mid`, img, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5 FROM motorcycle WHERE cbno = #{cbno}

select
distinct
from motorcycle
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into motorcycle (moid, cbno, moiname, moprice, moyearprice, modischarge, modomestic, mofuel, load, mid, img, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5) values (#{moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cbno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{moyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modischarge,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modomestic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mofuel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{load,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

cbno,

mapper.update:
update motorcycle
moid = #{record.moid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cbno = #{record.cbno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
moiname = #{record.moiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
moprice = #{record.moprice,jdbcType=REAL},
moyearprice = #{record.moyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modischarge = #{record.modischarge,jdbcType=REAL},
modomestic = #{record.modomestic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mofuel = #{record.mofuel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
load = #{record.load,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
img = #{record.img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update motorcycle set moid = #{record.moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cbno = #{record.cbno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, moiname = #{record.moiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moprice = #{record.moprice,jdbcType=REAL}, moyearprice = #{record.moyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modischarge = #{record.modischarge,jdbcType=REAL}, modomestic = #{record.modomestic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mofuel = #{record.mofuel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, load = #{record.load,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img = #{record.img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

cbno = #{cbno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
moiname = #{moiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
moprice = #{moprice,jdbcType=REAL},
moyearprice = #{moyearprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modomestic = #{modomestic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where moid = #{moid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
